How to Play

Welcome to QuizMaster! Follow these steps to get started:

  1. Select Your Quiz Settings
  2. Start the Quiz
  3. Answer Questions
    Make sure to answer before the timer runs out!
  4. Check Your Results
  5. Challenge Yourself!
    Play again to beat your previous score or try a different category!

Good luck!
